A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: When we last saw Luke Skywalker\,\, he was a swashbuckling hero of the cause. Here\, he is a regretful simp\, who doesn’t want to get involved for reasons that just aren’t true to his character. Or\, at least\, his character in this movie is not the Luke Skywalker that audiences want to see. And when he does finally pick up the light saber\, sort of\, it’s too little too late and ultimately too silly.
